Header: Tanak leads Portugal rally with Meeke, Neuville and Ogier chasing
Content: Estonian Ott Tanak led the Portuguese rally through Stage 13 as Skoda’s Jan Kopecký was forced to drive with his bonnet wide open, blocking his view of the road. The Czech driver didn’t lose a lot of ground despite the freak occurrence and hovers around the top 10 mark. Kris Meeke and Thierry Neuville were both breathing down Tanak’s neck at 4.3 seconds and 9.2 seconds respectively. Ogier is running fourth, 21 seconds behind Tanak.
